instructions.name: add_liquidity
docs: Add bilateral liquidity to both sides of the market

accounts.name: signer
docs: Either the pool creator OR the protocol authority can close the pool

accounts.name: post_creator
docs: Passed from API, validated against post ownership in backend

instructions.name: deploy_market
docs: Deploy market with initial liquidity (first trader)

instructions.name: get_current_state
docs: View-only instruction: Get current pool state with decay applied

instructions.name: trade
docs: Trade on the ICBS market (buy or sell LONG/SHORT tokens)

errors.name: InvalidCreatorSplit
errors.msg: Invalid creator split - must be <= 10000 basis points

fields.name: market_deployer
docs: First trader who deployed market (32 bytes)

fields.name: post_creator
docs: Post/content author (receives trading fees) (32 bytes) - NEW

fields.name: long_mint
docs: SPL token mint for LONG side (32 bytes)

fields.name: short_mint
docs: SPL token mint for SHORT side (32 bytes)

fields.name: vault
docs: USDC vault for this pool (32 bytes)

fields.name: s_long
docs: LONG token supply in WHOLE TOKENS (e.g., 25 = 25 tokens)
For SPL minting/burning, multiply by 1,000,000 to get atomic SPL units
Database stores whole tokens; on-chain stores whole tokens

fields.name: s_short
docs: SHORT token supply in WHOLE TOKENS (e.g., 25 = 25 tokens)
For SPL minting/burning, multiply by 1,000,000 to get atomic SPL units
Database stores whole tokens; on-chain stores whole tokens

fields.name: s_scale_long_q64
docs: σ_L in Q64.64 - virtualizes LONG token supply

fields.name: s_scale_short_q64
docs: σ_S in Q64.64 - virtualizes SHORT token supply

fields.name: sqrt_lambda_long_x96
docs: DEPRECATED: Telemetry only. Lambda is now derived from vault + sigma scales.

fields.name: sqrt_lambda_short_x96
docs: DEPRECATED: Telemetry only. Lambda is now derived from vault + sigma scales.

fields.name: current_epoch
docs: Current epoch for this pool (independent per-pool epoch counter)

fields.name: expiration_timestamp
docs: When belief expires - decay starts after this timestamp (8 bytes)

fields.name: last_decay_update
docs: Last time decay was applied on-chain (8 bytes)

fields.name: vault_balance
docs: Actual USDC in vault (for invariant checking)

types.name: CurrentPoolState
docs: Return type for get_current_state view function

fields.name: q
docs: Relevance score in Q32 format (use q / Q32_ONE to get 0.0-1.0 value)

fields.name: price_long
docs: LONG price in micro-USDC per token

fields.name: price_short
docs: SHORT price in micro-USDC per token

fields.name: sqrt_price_long_x96
docs: Square root of LONG price in X96 format

fields.name: sqrt_price_short_x96
docs: Square root of SHORT price in X96 format

fields.name: days_expired
docs: Days since expiration (0 if not expired)

fields.name: days_since_last_update
docs: Days since last on-chain decay update

fields.name: decay_pending
docs: True if decay will be applied on next trade

fields.name: last_decay_update
docs: Timestamp of last on-chain decay execution
